attributes.action: We want details of all trading agreements with Europe prior to us leaving.
attributes.background: This government was elected on the premis that they would get a better agreement with Europe than Labour. If agreements aren't revealed then I for one will assume Theresa May has agreed to every trade deal put forward by Europe. Which will no doubt throw our economy into the red for generations.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
